item.title: Cross-video Identity Correlating for Person Re-identification Pre-training
item.description: Cross-video Identity-cOrrelating pre-training (CION) revolutionizes person re-identification by leveraging identity correlation across videos for superior model pre-training, achieving state-of-the-ar…

item.title: Learning Commonality, Divergence and Variety for Unsupervised Visible-Infrared Person Re-identification
item.description: Progressive Contrastive Learning with Hard & Dynamic Prototypes (PCLHD) revolutionizes unsupervised visible-infrared person re-identification by effectively capturing data commonality, divergence, and…
